description: Unique name
name of bus to which generator is attached
P,Q,V control strategy for PF, must be "PQ", "PV" or "Slack".
Placeholder for generator type. Not yet implemented.
Nominal power for limits in OPF.
Switch to allow capacity p_nom to be extended in OPF.
If p_nom is extendable in OPF, set its minimum value.
If p_nom is extendable in OPF, set its maximum value (e.g. limited by technical potential).

The minimum output for each snapshot per unit of p_nom for the OPF (e.g. for variable renewable generators this can change due to weather conditions and compulsory feed-in; for conventional generators it represents a minimal dispatch).

The maximum output for each snapshot per unit of p_nom for the OPF (e.g. for varialbe renewable generators this can change due to weather conditions; for conventional generators it represents a maximum dispatch).
active power set point (for PF)
reactive power set point (for PF)
power sign
Prime mover energy carrier (e.g. coal, gas, wind, solar); required for CO2 calculation in OPF
Marginal cost of production of 1 MWh.
Capital cost of extending p_nom by 1 MW.
Ratio between primary energy and electrical energy, e.g. takes value 0.4 MWh_elec/MWh_thermal for gas. This is important for determining CO2 emissions per MWh.
active power at bus (positive if net generation)
reactive power (positive if net generation)
Optimised nominal power.
